ABOUT BIN SULTAN GROUP
A deep history of efforts and a culture full of honesty,honesty, self-confidence and a strong foundation of possibilities was our beginning in 1997 on the basis of scientific and studied we went to this way to develop real estate and complete our march by constructing our projects with unlimited support and team cards that did not stop progress and progress to Manabuwa due to the urgent need Construction will continue our march on this basis
Objectives
To provide our customers with the highest - level of quality can be achieved by the value of each transaction - that all transactions Group is built on the basis of honesty and principles and building confidence. - Responding to market variables and requirements. - Taking care of customer opinions and dealing with them seriously. - Focus on the importance of mutual loyalty between the client and the company. Obtain the ISO 9001 certification
the letter
Executing projects with professionalism and safety through a team of distinguished and dedicated customer care and uses the latest quality standards, and seeks to keep up with the latest developments of the times
Vision
Our vision is not just to build housing, but to build it well, to go ahead with its highest standards of professionalism and professionalism while not neglecting business ethics to exceed our customers expectations.

////services fragment Bussness Sector Construction Sector Real Estate Investment Bin Sultan Celebrations Maintenance Department
Ali Bin Sultan Group has set up a factory to manufacture all kinds of ducts in the industrial complex owned by the group on an area of ​​4000 square meters. It was agreed and contracted to supply the latest technological equipment as well as the technical management and structure necessary for project management. To carry out the work according to the technical specifications used and the engineering requirements
Execution of civil, mechanical and electrical construction projects including housing complexes, towers, palaces, government projects, management of all projects and equipment related to materials and equipment, as well as operation and maintenance.
real estate development Marketing \n Property Management \n Real estate valuation \n Real Estate Consulting
We have a number of event halls that provide customers with premium and high quality services
real estate development Marketing Property Management Real estate valuation Real Estate Consulting
////project fragment
Ben Sultan Razdens
The project includes a residential tower with 18 floors with a total of 208 apartments, in addition to many special features such as private parking, health club for men and women, event halls, driver rooms and many other services that we have developed for you.
Housing Ben Sultan
If you are eligible for projects of the Ministry of Housing hurry up now to book your apartment in the project through the icon booking top of the page and we will contact you soon
Rawabi bin Sultan Project
Rawabi Bin Sultan is the latest project of Bin Sultan Holding, which is a continuation of the series of project with the development of many features in the project: Number of buildings: 2 Height of building: 6 floors Number of residential units: 56 units Units:
Ben Sultan Golden Belt
The project contains 6 residential buildings with a total of 114 residential apartments in addition to many features such as private parking, drivers rooms and many other services that we have developed for you
///////customers fragment
HAPPY CUSTOMERS Here are some of our customers who take great pride in their service
Engineer Salm Al Shammari Dr Mamdouh Najjar Mahammed Saeed Al Bashir
Saad Bin Sultan Group is a pioneer in real estate development and is also distinguished by testing sites for individual investors. I bought them an apartment in the Andalusia neighborhood of Al-Khobar and after only two months, due to their full commitment to the agreements, I bought another apartment in the same location and also encouraged many of my colleagues to seize the opportunity to book an apartment before the offer came into effect.
Ali Saad Bin Sultan & Brothers Holding Group is keen to meet the needs of investors and customers. It also selects distinguished locations and high quality construction materials. It also provides the real estate investor with personal services that help to make good investment decisions. In many of the company\'s projects, The return on investment was excellent, God help them in the coming projects, which I know it will be a big shift for the work of the group Dr. Mamdouh Mohammed Najjar Associate Professor of Computer Science Retired King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals
Ali Saad Bin Sultan & Brothers Holding Group is continuously improving the construction of its residential units where each project is better than before. This is a remarkable guide for its customers to apply the company to the principles of continuous quality development. Mohammed Saeed Al-Bashir Al-Beshiri for financial and administrative consulting
